data.name: Roots of Yggdrasil
data.detailed_description:
Roots of Yggdrasil is a roguelike city-builder based on Norse mythology, set in a post-Ragnarok world. The World Tree, Yggdrasil, has been obliterated, and your gods are dead. Only shards of the nine realms remain, scattered about the cosmos, under constant threat of being devoured by the ravenous darkness of Ginnungagap.


Build Your Settlements

Each procedurally generated land you encounter is an opportunity to forge a new home. Draft from a vast pool of buildings to build your settlements and nurture the Roots of Yggdrasil back to life in order to progress.

Regrow Your Tribe

Meet a diverse cast of characters and discover their stories through unique events and encounters that will change the way you play! The world may lie in ruin and the gods may all be gone, but your tribe endures.

data.short_description: Ragnarok is over. The gods have fallen and the World Tree lays shattered. Against all odds, only a Viking tribe remains, caught in an endless loop at the end of time. Can they break the cycle and rebuild their broken home?
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 8.1 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: AMD FX-4350 or Intel equivalent.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650, 1 GB or AMD Radeon HD 7750, 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1300X or Intel Core i5-7400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5500 XT, 4 GB or Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible
